text: @Yamiche @sendavidperdue u need to stop lying  & name the business that made that statement.  Coronavirus virus is serious & 90,000+ American people are dead & dying, u got the nerve to say people don't won't to go back to work bcuz they rather collect unemployment, that's BULL SHIT
